description: Centralized RSS Sources Configuration - All sources are open-license, commercial-use permitted. Expanded with US & Japanese government agency sources.

sources.name: NASA Breaking News
sources.description: Latest breaking news from NASA
sources.legal_notes: US Government work, public domain

sources.name: NASA JPL News
sources.description: NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory news
sources.legal_notes: US Government work, public domain

sources.name: Wikipedia Current Events
sources.description: Neutral point of view current events
sources.legal_notes: CC BY-SA 3.0 - Must attribute Wikipedia

sources.name: Wikinews
sources.description: Free news source written by volunteers
sources.legal_notes: CC BY 2.5 - Must attribute Wikinews
